item.title: Report X-2024090852
item.description:
Report X-2024090852

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-18T09:15:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-28
  • City: DARTMOUTH
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE DUE TO THE RATTLE OF AEROSOL CANS. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED TWO X 1.5 OZ AEROSOL CANS OF FLAMMABLE COLOR MIST FOOD COLORING SPRAY. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER PACKAGING. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
